alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Livingston; Monroe; Niagara; Northern Cayuga; Northern Erie; Ontario; Orleans; Wayne; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 9:18PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ONTARIO... LIVINGSTON... WYOMING...ORLEANS...WAYNE...GENESEE...MONROE... NIAGARA...NORTHERN CAYUGA...AND NORTHERN ERIE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake effect snow will continue to move south across the Niagara Frontier, Genesee Valley, and northern Finger Lakes region this evening. This band of heavy lake effect snow will briefly reduce visibility to less than 1/4 mile and quickly cover roads with snow. The band of snow will cross a large portion of the NY Thruway from Buffalo to Syracuse with poor travel conditions. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...The band of heavy lake effect snow will continue to move south this evening. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Buffalo Metro Area, Greater Rochester Area, Batavia, Lima, Canandaigua, Newark, and Cato. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390, Interstate 490, and Interstate 590 in Rochester. Interstate 90 between exits 54 and 40. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow covered roads and very poor visibility. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
